verses.verse: יְשֻׂשׂ֥וּם <S%H7797><s%> shall be glad מִדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> The wilderness וְצִיָּ֑ה <S%H6723><s%> and the solitary place וְתָגֵ֧ל <S%H1523><s%> shall rejoice עֲרָבָ֛ה <S%H6160><s%> for them and the desert וְתִפְרַ֖ח <S%H6524><s%> and blossom כַּחֲבַצָּֽלֶת׃ <S%H2261><s%> as the rose

פָּרֹ֨חַ <S%H6524><s%> It shall blossom תִּפְרַ֜ח <S%H6524><s%> abundantly וְתָגֵ֗ל <S%H1523><s%> and rejoice אַ֚ף <S%H637><s%> with גִּילַ֣ת <S%H1525><s%> even with joy וְרַנֵּ֔ן <S%H7442><s%> and shout כְּב֤וֹד <S%H3519><s%> the glory הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon נִתַּן־ <S%H5414><s%> shall be given לָ֔הּ הֲדַ֥ר <S%H1926><s%> unto it the excellency הַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <S%H3760><s%> of Carmel וְהַשָּׁר֑וֹן <S%H8289><s%> and Sharon הֵ֛מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They יִרְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> they shall see כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֲדַ֥ר <S%H1926><s%> [and] the excellency אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> of our God ס

חַזְּק֖וּ <S%H2388><s%> Strengthen יָדַ֣יִם <S%H3027><s%> hands רָפ֑וֹת <S%H7504><s%> ye the weak וּבִרְכַּ֥יִם <S%H1290><s%> knees כֹּשְׁל֖וֹת <S%H3782><s%> the feeble אַמֵּֽצוּ׃ <S%H553><s%> and confirm

אִמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> Say לְנִמְהֲרֵי־ <S%H4116><s%> to them [that are] of a fearful לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> heart חִזְק֖וּ <S%H2388><s%> Be strong אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּירָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> fear הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> not behold your God נָקָ֣ם <S%H5359><s%> [with] vengeance יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> will come גְּמ֣וּל <S%H1576><s%> [with] a recompence אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> [even] God ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> he will come וְיֹשַׁעֲכֶֽם׃ <S%H3467><s%> and save

אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> Then תִּפָּקַ֖חְנָה <S%H6491><s%> shall be opened עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> Then the eyes עִוְרִ֑ים <S%H5787><s%> of the blind וְאָזְנֵ֥י <S%H241><s%> and the ears חֵרְשִׁ֖ים <S%H2795><s%> of the deaf תִּפָּתַֽחְנָה׃ <S%H6605><s%> shall be unstopped

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then יְדַלֵּ֤ג <S%H1801><s%> [man] leap כָּֽאַיָּל֙ <S%H354><s%> as an hart פִּסֵּ֔חַ <S%H6455><s%> Then shall the lame וְתָרֹ֖ן <S%H7442><s%> sing לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> and the tongue אִלֵּ֑ם <S%H483><s%> of the dumb כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִבְקְע֤וּ <S%H1234><s%> break out בַמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> for in the wilderness מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> shall waters וּנְחָלִ֖ים <S%H5158><s%> and streams בָּעֲרָבָֽה׃ <S%H6160><s%> in the desert

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will become הַשָּׁרָב֙ <S%H8273><s%> And the parched ground לַאֲגַ֔ם <S%H98><s%> shall become a pool וְצִמָּא֖וֹן <S%H6774><s%> and the thirsty land לְמַבּ֣וּעֵי <S%H4002><s%> springs מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water בִּנְוֵ֤ה <S%H5116><s%> in the habitation תַנִּים֙ <S%H8577><s%> of dragons רִבְצָ֔הּ <S%H7258><s%> where each lay חָצִ֖יר <S%H2682><s%> [shall be] grass לְקָנֶ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> with reeds וָגֹֽמֶא׃ <S%H1573><s%> and rushes

וְהָיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> will be there מַסְל֣וּל <S%H4547><s%> And an highway וָדֶ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> shall be there and a way וְדֶ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> The way הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> of holiness יִקָּ֣רֵא <S%H7121><s%> and it shall be called לָ֔הּ לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יַעַבְרֶ֥נּוּ <S%H5674><s%> shall not pass over טָמֵ֖א <S%H2931><s%> the unclean וְהוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he לָ֑מוֹ הֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> it but it [shall be] for those the wayfaring men דֶּ֛רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way וֶאֱוִילִ֖ים <S%H191><s%> though fools לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִתְעֽוּ׃ <S%H8582><s%> shall not err

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> will be there אַרְיֵ֗ה <S%H738><s%> No lion וּפְרִ֤יץ <S%H6530><s%> shall be there nor [any] ravenous חַיּוֹת֙ <S%H2416><s%> beast בַּֽל־ <S%H1077><s%> Nor יַעֲלֶ֔נָּה <S%H5927><s%> shall go up לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> No תִמָּצֵ֖א <S%H4672><s%> thereon it shall not be found שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְהָלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> shall walk גְּאוּלִֽים׃ <S%H1350><s%> there but the redeemed

וּפְדוּיֵ֨י <S%H6299><s%> And the ransomed יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יְשֻׁב֗וּן <S%H7725><s%> shall return וּבָ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> and come צִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> to Zion בְּרִנָּ֔ה <S%H7440><s%> with songs וְשִׂמְחַ֥ת <S%H8057><s%> joy עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> and everlasting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon רֹאשָׁ֑ם <S%H7218><s%> upon their heads שָׂשׂ֤וֹן <S%H8342><s%> and gladness וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <S%H8057><s%> joy יַשִּׂ֔יגוּ <S%H5381><s%> they shall obtain וְנָ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> shall flee away יָג֥וֹן <S%H3015><s%> and sorrow וַאֲנָחָֽה׃ <S%H585><s%> and sighing פ
